布莱恩·克兰斯顿 Bryan Cranston
贾斯汀·贝菲尔德 Justin Berfield
克里斯托弗·马斯特森 Christopher Masterson
简·卡兹玛拉克 Jane Kaczmarek

director.name: 布莱恩·克兰斯顿 Bryan Cranston

trans_title: 马尔科姆的一家 第四季
introduction: An offbeat, laugh track-lacking sitcom about a bizarrely dysfunctional family, the center of which is Malcolm, the middle of the two brothers who still live at home. His eldest (and favorite) sibling, Francis, boards at military school because his parents believe it will reform him and keep him out of trouble. Malcolm often has a hard time coping with his family life, but he has more troubles to contend with when he starts receiving special treatment at school after being diagnosed as an intellectually advanced genius.
chinese_title: 马尔科姆的一家 第四季
